-  init(_:onRequest:onCompletion:fallback:) 

Initializer# init(_:onRequest:onCompletion:fallback:)

PassKitSwiftUIiOS 16.0+iPadOS 16.0+Mac CatalystvisionOS

```
nonisolated
init(
    _ configuration: PKAddPaymentPassRequestConfiguration,
    onRequest: @escaping (AddPassToWalletButtonResponse) async -> PKAddPaymentPassRequest,
    onCompletion: @escaping (Result<PKSecureElementPass, any Error>) -> Void,
    @ViewBuilder fallback: () -> Fallback
)
```

Available when `Fallback` conforms to `View`.## [See Also](/documentation/passkit/addpasstowalletbutton/init(_:onrequest:oncompletion:fallback:)#see-also)

### [Creating the button](/documentation/passkit/addpasstowalletbutton/init(_:onrequest:oncompletion:fallback:)#Creating-the-button)
